content:
ENGLISH 义务教育教科书四年级下册义务教育教科书英语四年级下册 （一年级起点） （一年级起点） 英语全国价格举报电话：12315：4.90元 
[中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写 ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语 （一年级起点） 四年级下册亲爱的同学们，新学期开始啦！ 这学期，我们将学习如何表述日期和月份、季节和天气，以及如何介绍自己，还会学到我们的祖国及一些英语国家的人文地理知识。 同学们，你们喜欢什么节日？你们知道用英语怎么说这些节日吗？ 你们肯定都喜欢交朋友，你们想向自己的朋友做更多自我介绍吗？ 你们对我们的祖国了解多少呢？知道哪些说英语的国家呢？想知道他们的首都及名胜吗？那就开始我们这学期的学习吧！ 在学习中，你们要注意在词语与相应事物之间建立联想，多运用。这样， 你们会说和会写的东西就会更多！这套教材每个单元中有一篇故事，都非常有趣。你们要认真读哟！ 同学们，在英语学习中，你们一定要多参与，遇到问题主动向老师或同学请教，对所学内容及时复习和归纳。相信你们一定能出色地完成学习任务！ 致同 学 
CONTENTS Unit 1 Days and Months ···············1 Unit 2 Seasons ····························17 Unit 3 More About Me ···················33 Unit 4 Countries We Know ·········49 Word List ·········································65 Vocabulary ·······································69 1 UNIT 1 Lessons 1~6 Days and Months

Saturday is the sixth. Sunday is the seventh. Lesson 2 Days of the Week Let’s say the days of the week. It’s Wednesday. What day is it today ? 2 5 B Let’s sing! 3 Let’s sing! 4 Let’s play! Spin the wheel. What day is it ? 4 5 6 7 1 2 3 It’s Tuesday. It’s the second day of the week. Monday is the fi rst day of the week. Then comes Tuesday. Let’s take a peek. Wednesday, then Thursday. I like those days. But Friday is great in so many ways. Saturday is fun. We like to play. Sunday is a time to rest. What do you say ? Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday!

When is Children’s Day ? wh ere wh en wh at wh y ay wh d ay m ay pl ay w ay Sund ay yesterd ay birthd ay 1. May will play when swimming in the bay. 2. Who knows what, where, when and why? Try to read Tongue Twisters 12 A long time ago, Mr. Moon did not have a birthday. He wanted to find a month for his birthday. “No!” said March. “It is warm and sunny in March.” “I bring spring rain. I help plants grow,” April said. “I come first. I am the best month,” said January. Then February said, “Choose me! The Spring Festival is often in February!” “I bring International Workers’ Day,” said May, the fifth month. “Well, I bring Children’s Day,” said June. 1 3 2 4 Lesson 6 Mr. Moon’s Birthday Story time

content: 13 “We are always hot and sunny,” July and August said together. “Choose one of us!” “We are the cold months. We bring snow. It’s fun to play in the snow on your birthday!” said November and December. Then September said, “I make the weather nice and cool. Choose me, please!” “Wait! I change the colours of the leaves,” said October. “Hmm… I know what to do! I will have a birthday every month! Once a month, I will become big and round. Everyone will know it’s my birthday.” 5 7 6 8 What month does Mr. Moon choose for his birthday? Act out the story. It’s very cold. In our city, summer is from… In our city, spring is from… It’s warm. Talk about the four seasons in your city. 3 Let’s do it! Hi. I’m Sarah. I’m from Australia. In my city, summer is from November to January. And winter is from June to August. It is different from China. 20 1 What is it? Lesson 8 Sun and Rain This is the sun. The sun is hot. Look! content: 44 A mother horse and a little horse live on a farm. One day, the mother horse asks the little horse to carry a bag across the river. “Can you do this work for me?” “Sure, Mom.” Lesson 18 A Little Horse Crosses the River Story time At that time, Ms. Cow shows up. “Excuse me, Ms. Cow. Can I cross the river?” “Yes, you can. The water is not deep at all.” The little horse begins to cross the river. The little horse comes to the river. He stops and thinks, “Is the river deep? Can I cross it?” “Don’t cross the river, little horse!” A squirrel jumps down from a tree and cries. “It’s very deep. Yesterday, one of my friends drowned in this river.”

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404.pdf

content: 45 Think About It Is the river deep or not? What do you think? What can you learn from the story? cross 穿过 deep 深的 squirrel 松鼠 drown 淹死，溺死 The little horse doesn’t know what to do next. He goes home. Now he knows how deep the river is. “What’s the matter, my child?” “Ms. Cow says the river is not deep. But the squirrel says it is very deep. What can I do?” “My child, go and try yourself. Then you’ll know what to do. Be careful.” The little horse comes back to the river and crosses it. 46 2 Read and match Kim is 1.46 metres tall. I like to ride my bike. My home is near the park. I go to the library by bus. content: 47 4 3 Read and write Read and talk My name is Luo Li. I am ten years old. I am 1.45 metres tall. I like to read story books. by bike by taxi by bus Lucy: Hi Jack. How old are you? Jack: I’m 11 years old. Lucy: When is your birthday? Jack: My birthday is July 25 . Lucy: I’m 1.41 metres tall. How tall are you, Jack? Jack: I’m 1.52 metres tall. Lucy: Where do you live? Jack: I live in a house near the school . Lucy: How do you go to school, Jack? Jack: By bike . Name: Luo Li Age: 10 years old Height: 1.45 metres Likes: reading story books Name: Age: Height: Likes:

Key words and sentences 5 49 UNIT 4 Lessons 19~24 Countries We Know 50 Lesson 19 A Map of the World 1 A map of the world Look, class! This is a map of the world. Can you fi nd China on the map ? I live in Canada. There it is. I live in China. I live in Canada, too.

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404

content: 51 2 Where are you from? I’m from the U.S. I’m from the U.K. Where are you from ? Where are you from ? I’m from Australia. Round and round the earth goes. One big world, everyone knows. Look around. What do you see ? I see one world for you and me. I see Beijing . I see London, too. I see Washington, D.C. How about you ? I see all the people living together. Living in peace now and forever. B Let’s sing! 3 Let’s sing! 1 2 3 Where are you from ? 52 1 A map of China 1 2 What is the capital city of China, Li Ming ? Lesson 20 China This is a map of our country. We live in China. We speak Chinese. This is the fl ag of China. Do you know ? Yes, I know. It is red. It has fi ve yellow stars. It’s Beijing !

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404.pdf

content: 53 2 In China I know the name in Chinese. This is a _________ of China. We live in _________. We _________ Chinese. This is the fl ag of China. It is red. It has fi ve _________ _________. Look and write. 3 Let’s do it! This is Tian’anmen Square in Beijing . What is this, Li Ming ? It’s called the Great Wall in English. 54 1 A map of Canada What do you know, Li Ming ? This country is Canada. I know about Canada! Lesson 21 Canada Jenny and Danny live in Canada. Canada is far from China. The capital city of Canada is Ottawa. People speak English and French in Canada . Canada has cold winters and hot summers. This is the fl ag of Canada. It has a red maple leaf on it. Ottawa

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404.pdf

content: 55 2 In Canada Let’s sing! 3 Let’s sing! I live in Canada. Don’t you know ? Here is something special that we all know. It’s a country of many cultures. It’s in North America. You should go! This is Niagara Falls. Niagara Falls is a famous waterfall in Canada. This is the CN Tower in Canada. It’s famous. 56 1 The U.S. 1 2 In the U.S., they speak... Lesson 22 The U.S. and the U.K. Here is a map of the U.S. The capital city is Washington, D.C. English! This is the White House. It is in Washington, D.C. This is the Statue of Liberty. It’s in New York. This is the fl ag of the U.S. It is red, white and blue. 57 Lesson 22 The U.S. and the U.K. 2 The U.K. 1 2 What do they speak in the U.K. ? What country is this, Li Ming ? It’s the U.K. The fl ag of the U.K. is red, white and blue. This is Big Ben. It is in London. That’s easy! English! Do you know the capital city of the U.K .? Yes, I know! It’s London.

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404.pdf

content: 58 1 A map of Australia Lesson 23 Australia It’s Australia. Kangaroos live in Australia. There are many beautiful beaches in Australia. Miss Zhang: Do you know the capital city of Australia? Li Ming: No, I don’t know. Miss Zhang: The capital city of Australia is Canberra. Li Ming: I know they speak English in Australia! Miss Zhang: That’s right! This is the fl ag of Australia. What colour is it? Li Ming: It’s blue, red and white. 2 In Australia What country is it ?

content: 59 Letters and sounds 4 I want to go to London in the U.K. See Big Ben along the way. Go to Australia to see a kangaroo. I hope to see a koala bear, too. In the U.S. I ’ d like to see The Statue of Liberty. In Canada, give my friends a call. See the CN Tower and Niagara Falls. Back here in China, there is so much to see. First Tian ’ anmen Square, then the Great Wall, please! 3 Let’s chant! kn ow kn ee kn ife ch al kn w al l t al l w al k Ch ina bea ch tea ch er Try to read 1. There is a tall wall beside the waterfall. 2. How much wood could a woodchuck chuck? Tongue Twisters

content: 60 1 3 2 4 Hi! It’s me, Maddy the Monster. My family lives in many different countries. Do you want to see my family photos? I like to go to Niagara Falls. This is me at Niagara Falls. This is me. I live in Canada. I speak English and French. This is my cousin. My cousin lives in Beijing. She speaks Chinese. She likes to go to the Great Wall. It is long. Lesson 24 Maddy’s Family Photos Story time

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（一年级起点）四年级下册_1f71f404.pdf

content: 61 5 6 7 This is my grandfather. Do you know where he lives? Yes! He lives in the U.S. My grandfather likes to see the Statue of Liberty. What do they speak in the U.S.? They speak English. This is my aunt. My aunt lives in London. Do you know where London is? Yes! It’s in the U.K. It is the capital city of the U.K. My aunt likes to have tea with the queen at the palace. This is my uncle. My uncle lives in Australia. He speaks very good English. My uncle likes to go to the beach. How does he go to the beach? By kangaroo. Think About It Where does Maddy live ? □ She lives in Canada. □ She lives in the U.S . Where does Maddy’s grandfather live ? □ He lives in the U.S . □ He lives in Australia. How does Maddy’s uncle go to the beach ? □ By monster. □ By kangaroo. photo 照片 queen 女王

Lily: __________ Wang Nan: What colour is the fl ag of the U.K.? Lily: __________ Wang Nan: Where is Big Ben? Lily: __________ a. It’s red, white and blue. b. They speak English. c. It’s the capital city of the U.K. d. It’s in London. 63 3 Look, write and say Country Capital City Language China Canada the U.K. the U.S. Australia Beijing London Canberra Ottawa Washington, D.C. English Chinese French This is a kangaroo. It lives in Australia. Canberra is the capital city of Australia. People in Australia speak English.
